featured.text: Forced to quit school in fifth grade after his father died, Abate worked as a shoe-shine boy for years.
Continuous as the stars that shine And twinkle on the Milky Way, They stretched in never-ending line Along the margin of a bay:

definition.en_def: To emit light or reflect light; to be bright or radiant.
definition.example: The stars shine brightly in the night sky.
